overview: With more than 21 years of consumer electronics experience at the corporate level, Baran will drive all domestic and international business objectives for the company. Prior to joining Speck Products, Baran spent 20 years at Monster Cable, where she held a variety of key management, operations, product development and marketing roles that culminated in her 12 year tenure as COO. Baran was integral in the successful implementation of building the companyâ€™s global structure, most notably a new Operations base in Ireland, Sales base in the U.K. and Hong Kong, and sourcing base in China. During her time at Monster Cable, Baran was instrumental in guiding the organization through tremendous success and growth. The Daily Post (August 30, 2004) cited the privately-held companyâ€™s revenue at more than $300 million.
